content: I don't have access to real-time information about specific restaurants in bursa. however, i can suggest doing a quick online search for lebanese restaurants in bursa, and then reading online reviews to find a highly recommended option. some popular lebanese dishes include hummus, tabbouleh, falafel, kafta, and shawarma. if you're a foodie, then trying these dishes can be a great way to explore new flavors and textures in bursa.
